title: Animal Coverings
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 25 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Students will learn about the different types of coverings that animals have in this informational text. Photographs, repetitive text, and high-frequency words support emergent readers.
reviewWords: armor, feathers, scales, shells, skin, spines
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sound /f/
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word we
